_comment: All configuration values have defaults defined in connector.py constants
_comment_error_threshold_per_thread: Max errors per thread before stopping, default: 5
_comment_total_error_threshold: Max total errors before sync termination, default: 15
_comment_enable_circuit_breaker: Enable circuit breaker pattern, default: true
_comment_max_retries: Maximum retry attempts per request, default: 3
